data.title: Halloween New Wave: A Playlist â€” Spooky Little Halloween
data.meta_description: Here's a killer Halloween new wave playlist with 30+ songs even the darkest of hearts will love listening to all October long.
data.text:
Music purists will argue to the death that half - or most - of the bands I've included aren't truly part of the New Wave genre.

They are right, and I'm okay being completely wrong.

You might know prior to starting Spooky Little Halloween, I lived in the music world as a blogger. And here's the thing about music genres: they're a bunch of marketing crap.

Yes, it's convenient to group together like bands, slap a label on them and point to their music as defining a movement. But I also think a lot of genres and subgenres were once made up in the heads of rock critics who needed a clever way to describe the hot new band they were required to write about.

So when I say New Wave, it's more of a sound I'm after than genre accuracy.

Okay, enough music snob chatter - let's listen to some spooky tunes.

Halloween New Wave
